{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = DSR-150N-side1.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = 8-Port Fast Ethernet Wireless VPN Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://support.dlink.com/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DSR-150N |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DSR-150N_A2 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DSR-150N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = DSR |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2SR150NA2 |icid = 4216A-SR150NA2 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CNS3411; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = ARM11MPCore |cpu1spd = 600 <!-- 300 / 500 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL256EHT2I-90Q; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T1G164QF-BCE7; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101A; |sw1chip = IC+;IP178C; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C8:D3:A3, 70:62:B8, |oui = C8:D3:A3, 70:62:B8,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2008.10-mpcore-svn606;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31.1-cavm1;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ45 console,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2 Channel RS232 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, 8K Two-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C08A;;1;,,, Low drop positive voltage regulator;STMicroelectronics;LD1117;;1;,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;2;,,, 3A, 23V, 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8290;;1;,,, 3-state Octal buffer/line driver;NXP;74LVCH244A;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 139.99 |upc = 790069374876 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00B7MYSJY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9287; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''DSR-150N REV.A2'' and ''2340DSR150N*17A2'' are silkscreened on the board.
==Links of Interest== *[ftp://ftp2.dlink.com/PRODUCTS/DSR-150N/REVA/DSR-150N_REVA_QIG_v2.10_WW.pdf Quick Install Guide] *[ftp://ftp2.dlink.com/PRODUCTS/DSR-SERIES/DSR-SERIES_MANUAL_v3.13_WW.pdf User Manual] *[https://dlink-gpl.s3.amazonaws.com/GPL1300006/D-Link_DSR-150N_GPL-SRC_v1.05B48.tar.bz2 GPL Firmware Source]
